docs.snippet: Uber’s stock buyback deal requires workers to follow the “instructions of Travis Kalanick” on “any and all matters” submitted to a shareholder vote.

headline.print_headline: How Kalanick Collects Even More Clout at Uber
headline.main: How Uber’s Chief Is Gaining Even More Clout in the Company

docs.snippet: The board is considering Travis Kalanick’s future and the recommendations of Eric H. Holder Jr.’s investigation into the company’s culture.

headline.print_headline: With Its Brash Ways Under Fire, Uber Weighs Leadership Shuffle
headline.main: Uber Weighs Leave of Absence for Chief Executive

docs.snippet: The election of Donald J. Trump has provoked elation, outrage and self-reflection. It has even prompted career changes.

headline.print_headline: An Election Serves As a Call to Work
headline.main: Want to Resist Trump or Make America Great Again? These People Switched Careers

docs.snippet: With Democrats stunned by the firing of the F.B.I. director, those sympathetic to the president believe he is once again being held to an unfair standard.

headline.print_headline: Resentful of Criticism, Conservatives Dig In in Defense of the President
headline.main: For Trump Supporters, the Real Outrage Is the Left’s Uproar Over Comey

docs.snippet: With new perspective after her husband’s unexpected death, the author of “Lean In” addresses issues that some readers found troubling about that book.

headline.main: Sheryl Sandberg Finds Comfort for Herself and Offers It to Others

docs.snippet: Rival versions of the Trump-Russia scandal are fighting for narrative supremacy, leaving news veterans wondering, “What if Watergate happened now?”

headline.print_headline: Unlike in Watergate, Media Offers a Choice of Facts
headline.main: In Watergate, One Set of Facts. In Trump Era, Take Your Pick.

docs.snippet: Yahoo’s chief executive presided over the decline and sale of the company. But she delivered big rewards to investors.
To date, little has changed to achieve the executive orders’ stated goal: to tighten up vetting of people trying to get into the country.

headline.print_headline: Vetting Is Little Changed Since Calls for Travel Ban
headline.main: Despite Trump’s Tough Talk on Travel Ban, Few Changes to Vetting
